Well as the title says, infinite range planes are possible in 1.0.5!  infinite fuel jets apparently work now, something i discovered today accidentally.  Take a craft made of a cockpit on front, mk1-mk2 adaptor, mk2 bomb bay (short one), another backward facing mk1-mk2 adaptor, then any jet engine on the back.  Set the fuel level within the 2 tanks to minimal (but there has to be some fuel inside them at all times).  Then take a science-jr, place it on the rear node of the bomb bay, and take any small fuel tank such as oscar-B and place it on the front of the science-jr, you can drain this tank completely.  Add intake anywhere (such as on the nose if you decide to use inline intake), or a radial one, doesnt matter from my tests.

the result: a plane that has 50% thrust on the jet engine, and not one drop of fuel is used per second!  As fun as this is, please fix it squad, infinigliding was bad enough

Edited December 6, 2015 by panzer1b
This is a known issue by the way.
